page.title: 14A day in the life of.
page.content: I had to get up and go to school.I flew out of the door and ran like mad to school.I didnt stop to call for my friend Anthony Parker who lives in Leonards Close.I made it in a couple of minutes and had time to play for 5 minutes.After we went into school I started work on the Domesday Project.As the minutes ticked by it was soon playtime.We left our work and wet out to play rugby.I tackled Tony Turner my friend on the half way line and we both slid in front of our teams try line but Bob Everitt stopped us from sliding over it.We played rugby for another 5 minutes then it was in_time so we went in to do some work.At half past 11 the infant class started singing songs about food and it made the whole class feel hungry. We all had to starve until dinner time.
